DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim population-based screening study ass whether skin cancer screen train family physician dermatologists lead improve screen outcomes . The training course aim increase accuracy detect early stage skin cancer . Screening outcomes intervention region ( Calgary , Canada ) physicians receive training compare screen outcome control region ( Edmonton , Canada ) physician training administer . The investigator determine whether : - clinical screening outcome favorable group train physician compare non trained physician - increase knowledge skin cancer screen among trained physician , compare non train physician - skin cancer screening associate psycho-social harm - population-based screening effect overall incidence stage-specific-incidence skin cancer Alberta The investigator aim recruit 100 physician per region ( total 200 physician ) screen 40,000 80,000 individual period 20 month .
